Class CPNNetFigure

public final class CPNNetFigure
extends org.rakiura.draw.figure.RoundRectangleFigure
implements CPNAbstractNetFigure

Constructor Detail

CPNNetFigure

public CPNNetFigure()
Creates a new NetFigure with a new empty BasicNet. The name and ID are set to a new unique ID.

See Also:
CPNNetFigure(Net)

CPNNetFigure

public CPNNetFigure(Net aNet)
Creates a new NetFigure from the provided Net. Name and annotations of the Net are displayed. The display of the name can be switched off. The annotations can be displayed as symbols (default) or as the actual text.

Parameters:
aNet - a Net that is to be displayed by this CPNAbstractNetFigure
See Also:
setNameVisible(boolean)

inspect

public boolean inspect(org.rakiura.draw.DrawingView aView,
                       boolean alternate)
Inspects the figure. If alternate is false, it will show the actual annotations respectively as text

Specified by:
inspect in interface org.rakiura.draw.Figure
Overrides:
inspect in class org.rakiura.draw.AbstractFigure
Parameters:
aView - the DrawingView of this figure
alternate - alternate inspection or not?
Returns:
true if inspection is called, false if no figure could be inspected.

deReference

public void deReference()
Makes sure that the figure does not listen to a netElement anymore. Use it if a figure is not displayed anymore. e.g. when the drawing is closed.

Specified by:
deReference in interface CPNAbstractFigure
See Also:
CPNAbstractFigure.reReference()

reReference

public void reReference()
Makes sure that the figure does listen to its netElement again. Use it if a figure is displayed again. e.g. when a drawing is redisplayed.

Specified by:
reReference in interface CPNAbstractFigure
See Also:
CPNAbstractFigure.deReference()
